post.summary: Calculate a route avoiding some RoutingPoints, e.g. Suez Canal
post.description:
- Support multi-leg voyage and get the distance of each leg
- All distances are given in nautical miles
- Find all routing points/waypoints(? need) that a voyage leg transits
- Find all ECA zones of each leg
- Sample request:

{
  "Ports": [
    "JPCHB",
    "DKCPH",
    "USLO8",
    "AUMEL",
    "RUNVS",
    "AEPRA",
  ],
  "RoutingPoints": [
    "PAN",
  ],
  "AntiPiracy": true
}

post.summary: Get all potential RoutingPoints by ports

EcaZone.description: ECA zone name, the value is absent if the port is not in ECA zone

Location.description: The Geo information of the port
The Geo information of the location

Latitude.description: Decimal geodetic latitude of the localtion

OpenByDefault.description: Whether or not the point is open by default

Code.description: The three letter code of the Routing Point

Ports.description: An ordered list of port names or codes, please refer to the [ports](/api/distance/v1/ports)

RoutingPoints.description: List of routing points to close, please refer to the [routingpoints](/api/distance/v1/routingpoints)

TotalDistance.description: The total distance (in nautical miles) for all legs

Distance.description: The distance (in nautical miles) for this leg

RoutingPoints.description: The list of Rounting Points in the voyage segment

EcaZones.description: The list of ECA Zones in the voyage segment

IsOpened.description: Whether or not the point is open

Code.description: The three letter code of the Routing Point
